tool.name: FastaCLI
tool.description: Appends decoy sequences to FASTA files
tool.command:
#set $temp_stderr = "fasta_cli_stderr" mkdir output && cwd=`pwd` &&
echo 'DB: ${input_database.display_name} sequences: ${input_database.metadata.sequences}' &&
cp '${input_database}' input_database.fasta &&
########################################### #### Creating decoy database #### ###########################################
echo 'Creating decoy database.' && searchgui -Djava.awt.headless=true eu.isas.searchgui.cmd.FastaCLI --exec_dir="./bin/" -temp_folder `pwd` -in input_database.fasta -decoy -decoy_flag _REVERSED -suffix 2 2>> $temp_stderr && rm input_database.fasta &&
cat $temp_stderr 2>&1;
tool.help:
**What it does**
Appends decoy sequences to FASTA files adding to the accessions (as a suffix) "_REVERSED". This format is adequated to be used by SearchGUI and PeptideShaker tools.
